subtitle: Our Process
title: How it Works
description: Introductions are handled with care and discretion, prioritising long-term trust and clear, direct access to the appropriate contacts.

steps.title: Get in Touch by Scheduling a Meeting
steps.description: Reach out by requesting a meeting or contacting us via WhatsApp or email. Share what you’re looking for and any relevant details so we can understand your needs clearly.

steps.title: We identify the right contacts
steps.description: Your request is reviewed carefully, and the most suitable local professionals or businesses are identified based on experience, relevance, and reliability.

steps.title: Introduction and ongoing support
steps.description: You are connected directly with the right people. We remain involved as much or as little as you prefer — whether acting as a local point of contact or stepping back entirely.
